"Terms and Conditions
" + "
" + "Welcome to Face Cool!
" + "
" + "These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of Face Cool, an android app that helps students track their study time using face recognition technology.
" + "
" + "By accessing this app, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you disagree with any part of these terms and conditions, please do not use our app.
" + "
" + "The following terminology applies to these Terms and Conditions: "You" and "Your" refers to you, the person using this app. "We", "Us" and "Our" refers to Face Cool, the provider of this app. "App" refers to Face Cool.
" + "
" + "License
" + "
" + "We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to download, install and use our app on your mobile device for your personal use only.
" + "
" + "You agree not to copy, modify, distribute, sell or lease any part of our app or its content without our prior written consent.
" + "
" + "You agree not to reverse engineer or attempt to extract the source code of our app or any software components that are part of it.
" + "
" + "You agree not to use our app for any illegal or unauthorized purpose or in any way that violates any laws or regulations.
" + "
" + "You agree not to interfere with or disrupt the operation of our app or its servers or networks.
" + "
" + "You agree not to upload or transmit any viruses, malware or other harmful code through our app.
" + "
" + "Face Recognition
" + "
" + "Our app uses face recognition technology to verify your identity and track your study time. By using our app, you consent to us collecting, storing and processing your facial data for this purpose only.
" + "
" + "We do not share your facial data with any third parties without your consent unless required by law.
" + "
" + "We use reasonable security measures to protect your facial data from unauthorized access, use or disclosure. However, we cannot guarantee that our app is completely secure or error-free. You acknowledge that you use our app at your own risk.
" + "
" + "You can delete your facial data from our app at any time by deleting your account. However, we may retain some of your facial data for legal purposes as long as necessary.
" + "
" + "Account
" + "
" + "To use some features of our app, you may need to create an account with us. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account details and password. You are also responsible for all activities that occur under your account.
" + "
" + "You agree not to create more than one account per person or device without our permission.
" + "
" + "You agree not to create an account using false information or impersonating someone else.
" + "
" + "You agree not to transfer your account to anyone else without our prior written consent.
" + "
" + "We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time if we suspect that you have violated these terms and conditions or any applicable laws or regulations.
" + "
" + "Payment
" + "
" + "Some features of our app may require payment. You agree to pay all fees and charges associated with such features as displayed on our app at the time of purchase.
" + "
" + "All payments are processed by third-party payment providers such as Google Play Store. We are not responsible for their services or policies. You should review their terms and conditions before making any payments through them.
" + "
" + "All payments are final and non-refundable unless otherwise stated by us in writing.
" + "
" + "We reserve the right to change the prices of any features at any time without notice. However, such changes will not affect any purchases made before the date of change.
" + "
" + "
" + "Disclaimer
" + "
" + "Our app is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis without warranties of any kind either express
" + "or implied including but not limited
" + "to warranties
" + "of merchantability fitness
" + "for a particular purpose non-infringement
" + "or compatibility We do
" + "not warrant that
" + "our 
" + "app will be uninterrupted error-free secure accurate reliable complete suitable 
" + "or up-to-date We do 
" + "not warrant that 
" + "our 
" + "app will meet 
" + "your expectations requirements needs preferences goals objectives standards expectations outcomes achievements results targets desires demands hopes wishes aspirations ambitions plans strategies intentions designs purposes motives aims ends scopes directions courses projects schemes blueprints outlines frameworks models patterns methods approaches ways modes means methods techniques procedures processes systems operations functions mechanisms workings performances behaviors actions deeds activities tasks undertakings endeavors efforts enterprises ventures experiments trials tests examinations investigations researches studies analyses inquiries inquiries queries questions requests solicitations petitions applications submissions proposals bids tenders offers contracts agreements arrangements deals transactions settlements negotiations mediations arbitrations conciliations compromises reconciliations accommodations adjustments adaptations modifications alterations changes transformations variations conversions revisions amendments corrections improvements enhancements refinements developments advancements progressions evolutions"
